
{{Server client function}}
This function is used to remove the current clothes of a certain type on a [[/ped.md|ped]]. It will remove them if the clothesTexture and clothesModel aren't specified, or if they match the current clothes on that slot.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool removePedClothes ( ped thePed, int clothesType, [ string clothesTexture, string clothesModel ] )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/ped.md|ped]]:removeClothes}}

===Required Arguments===
*'''thePed''': The [[/ped.md|ped]] you want to remove clothes from.
*'''clothesType''': the clothes slot/type to remove. See the [[/CJ_Clothes.md|clothes catalog]].

===Optional Arguments===
*'''clothesTexture''': (Server only) A string determining the clothes texture that will be removed. See the [[/CJ_Clothes.md|clothes catalog]].
*'''clothesModel''': (Server only) A string determining the clothes model that will be removed. See the [[/CJ_Clothes.md|clothes catalog]].

==Returns==
This function returns ''true'' if the clothes were successfully removed from the ped, ''false'' otherwise.

==Example==
<section name="Server" class="server" show="true">
This example adds a 'moto' helmet to a player when he gets on a nrg bike, and removes it when he gets off.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function addHelmetOnEnter ( vehicleEntered, seat, jacked )
    if getElementModel ( vehicleEntered ) == 522 then      -- if it's a nrg
        addPedClothes ( source, "moto", "moto", 16 )       -- add the helmet
    end
end
addEventHandler ( "onPlayerVehicleEnter", root, addHelmetOnEnter )

function removeHelmetOnExit ( vehicleExited, seat, jacked )
    if getElementModel ( vehicleExited ) == 522 then       -- if it's a nrg
        removePedClothes ( source, 16, "moto", "moto" )    -- remove that helmet
    end
end
addEventHandler ( "onPlayerVehicleExit", root, removeHelmetOnExit )
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>
